item.title: CVE-2024-6528|2024-07-11T09:03:27.074Z -- schneider%20electric -- modicon%20controllers%20m241%20%2F%20m251
item.description: CWE-79: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability exists that could cause a vulnerability leading to a cross-site scripting condition where attackers can have a victimâ€™s browser run arbitrary JavaScript when they visit a page containing the injected payload.
